column1: The DHEA-sulfate test measures the amount of DHEA-sulfate in the blood.
DHEA-sulfate is a weak male hormone (androgen) produced by the adrenal gland in both men and women.
However, tell your health care provider if you are taking any vitamins or supplements that contain DHEA or DHEA-sulfate.
It may also be done in women with pituitary disease or adrenal disease who are concerned about low libido or decreased sexual satisfaction.
